title: Group Therapy: He Won't Ask Her Dad For Permission to Propose
description: Kelly is having an issue with her boyfriend.  He is supposed to propose soon and she wants him to ask her dad for permission but he says that's an outdated/sexist tradition and doesn't want to.  Kelly doesn't know how to deal with it because she knows it means a lot to her dad but her boyfriend isn't budging....
